izzy.features.mround¶

izzy.features.mround(x, m=1, mode='nearest')[source]¶

Round to the nearest m.

Parameters

  • x (int, float, or ArrayLike) – Value(s).

  • m (int or float) – Coarseness for rounding.

  • mode (str) – ‘floor’, ‘ceiling’, or ‘nearest’. Any substring will also work.

Returns

Value(s) rounded to m.

Return type

float or np.ndarray

Previous topic

izzy.features.granulate

Next topic

izzy.features.weight_of_evidence
